## MapView.animatedExtrusionHandler property

The \[\[AnimatedExtrusionHandler\]\] controls animated extrusion effect of the extruded objects in the \[\[Tile\]\]

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get animatedExtrusionHandler(): AnimatedExtrusionHandler;
```
